short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IDrive is an online backup and cloud storage service for homes and small businesses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The all new Chrome web app makes it possible to backup, access and restore data directly from your browser.
IDrive is an online backup and cloud storage service, which can backup an unlimited number of devices into a single account and access them from anywhere - no matter which IDrive plan you belong to!

Security: Military-grade security using 256 bit AES encryption, with an option to set a user-defined key to protect your data.

Sub-accounts: Create sub-accounts for associates by fragmenting your account space.

Secure Sharing: Share files with associates over email, LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter.

Remote Manage: Manage your backup set and schedule from any browser.

Mobile apps:  Access backed up files and secure your mobile data with the mobile applications.

IDrive Express: Swift backup and retrieval of your data via physical storage shipment.
 
Protect, access, and share your digital life with IDrive!
